songs.title: A Mason (Amazing Grace)
songs.lyrics:
Verse 1:

Dollars building up like a mason
She wet off the Paul like she Mason (Paul Mason)
Hit a Taurus on my tour bus call that MAY-Sin
Bad boy never switch up like Mase did

Jordan Greys/Grace life is so amazing
Say I'm Mason but get no love from the Baliff
Swerving LANEZ I just Torey/Rih up made her "Say it"
Throw shade in your room but in person you don't say SHIT

Word on the street Tyson(mike) rocking-Robin(givens)
Nothing but my polos on got Robin Jock'n
Real REP/Rap No we don't beef with sangers
Twitter fingers ain't really twisting fingers

Money talk so I guess you speaking sign language
Born in WATTS why u shocked I know some Gang Bangers (Guess I'm hood famous)
Life so amazing They think I'm amazing/A mason -like Grace

Wake up in the morning before Kiss it say my grace

Made love an autumn  just so we can have a son in May
(May-son)
Im just tryna build with you babe


Hook: No Jay, but I'm A. mason 4x



Verse 2: Illuminated Naughty nature so my wrist lit
Just got an O.O.P from my EX Bih
Too busy counting all this paper that I'm spending
Fell out of love she was head over Christians

House in the hills got your heels in to the ceiling
Real G no Mason but I'm inna  building
Life so amazing They think I'm amazing/A mason -like Grace

Wake up in the morning before Kiss it say my grace

Made love an autumn  just so we can have a son in May
(May-son)

Im just tryna build with you babe

(Hook) No Jay, but I'm A. mason 4x
